display_name: Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index: Daytime dysfunction component subscore
description:
Subscore based on 2 items from Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index, with a range of 0-3. A score of "0" indicates no difficulty, while a score of "3" indicates severe difficulty. [Buysse et. al 1989 (PubMed ID: 2748771)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/2748771/)

[Search for all PSQI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/mros/variables?search=psqi)
